panels.description: 等待执行的集群变更任务数量
panels.name: Pending tasks

panels.description: 绿色：健康，黄色：存在副本分片异常，红色：存在主分片异常
panels.name: Cluster health

panels.description:
活跃分片数
Aggregate total of all shards across all indices, which includes replica shards
panels.name: Active shards

panels.description:
活跃主分片数
The number of primary shards in your cluster. This is an aggregate total across all indices.
panels.name: Active primary shards

panels.description:
创建中分片数量
Count of shards that are being freshly created
panels.name: Initializing shards

panels.description:
迁移中分片数量
The number of shards that are currently moving from one node to another node.
panels.name: Relocating shards

panels.description:
未分配的分片数量
The number of shards that exist in the cluster state, but cannot be found in the cluster itself
panels.name: Unassigned shards

panels.description:
暂缓分配的分片数量，当节点丢失，会发生选主和数据拷贝。为了较少网络抖动等原因导致的重分配情况，配置delay参数，该值为等待delay到期将被重分配的分片数量
Shards delayed to reduce reallocation overhead
panels.name: Delayed shards

panels.description: 预估内存大小和限制内存大小
panels.name: Estimated size in bytes of breaker

panels.description: 进程内存占用/限制/峰值（byte）
panels.name: JVM memory usage

panels.description: 节点文档总数，不包含已删除文档和子文档以及刚索引的文档
panels.name: Documents count on node

panels.description: 平均每秒合并文档大小
panels.name: Documents merged bytes

panels.description: 排队等待线程任务数量
panels.name: Thread Pool threads queued

panels.description: fielddata cache平均每秒内存剔除次数

panels.description: query cache平均每秒内存剔除次数
panels.name: Query cache evictions

panels.description: 老版本的filter cache内存剔除次数
panels.name: Evictions from filter cache
